steps.plaintext: Rescue the person surrounded by monsters
steps.markdown: Rescue the person surrounded by monsters

substeps.plaintext: Hilichurl x3
substeps.markdown: <img:hilichurl> ◀Hilichurl▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Hilichurl▷ x3

substeps.plaintext: Pull the lever next to Fujiwara to start.
substeps.markdown: Pull the lever next to Fujiwara to start.

substeps.plaintext: Step on the 3 panels in the order indicated by Fujiwara Toshiko's Treasure Map. You can read the map again in Quest Item tab of your inventory. Take note of the 3 symbols in Inazuma Language.
substeps.markdown: Step on the 3 panels in the order indicated by ◀Fujiwara Toshiko's Treasure Map▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Fujiwara_Toshiko%27s_Treasure_Map▷. You can read the map again in Quest Item tab of your inventory. Take note of the 3 symbols in ◀Inazuma Language▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Inazuma_Language▷.

substeps.plaintext: Facing the lever, step on the 3 panels from left to right.
substeps.markdown: Facing the lever, step on the 3 panels from left to right.

substeps.plaintext: Pull the lever next to Fujiwara to start.
substeps.markdown: Pull the lever next to Fujiwara to start.

substeps.plaintext: Facing the chest, start from the bottom-right panel.
substeps.markdown: Facing the chest, start from the bottom-right panel.

substeps.plaintext: Walk over all the panels to the top-right panel.
substeps.markdown: Walk over all the panels to the top-right panel.

substeps.plaintext: Walk over all the panels to the top-left panel.
substeps.markdown: Walk over all the panels to the top-left panel.

substeps.plaintext: Walk over all the panels to the bottom-left panel.
substeps.markdown: Walk over all the panels to the bottom-left panel.

substeps.plaintext: Walk over 2 panels to the right.
substeps.markdown: Walk over 2 panels to the right.

substeps.plaintext: Walk over 1 panel to the top.
substeps.markdown: Walk over 1 panel to the top.

substeps.plaintext: Walk over 1 panel to the left.
substeps.markdown: Walk over 1 panel to the left.

substeps.plaintext: Pull the lever next to Fujiwara to start.
substeps.markdown: Pull the lever next to Fujiwara to start.

substeps.plaintext: Facing the chest, start from the bottom-left panel.
substeps.markdown: Facing the chest, start from the bottom-left panel.

substeps.plaintext: Walk over all the panels to the top-left panel.
substeps.markdown: Walk over all the panels to the top-left panel.

substeps.plaintext: Walk over 2 panels to the right.
substeps.markdown: Walk over 2 panels to the right.

substeps.plaintext: Walk over 1 panel to the bottom.
substeps.markdown: Walk over 1 panel to the bottom.

substeps.plaintext: Walk over 1 panel to the left.
substeps.markdown: Walk over 1 panel to the left.

substeps.plaintext: Walk over 1 panel to the bottom.
substeps.markdown: Walk over 1 panel to the bottom.

substeps.plaintext: Walk over all the panels to the bottom-right panel.
substeps.markdown: Walk over all the panels to the bottom-right panel.

substeps.plaintext: Walk over all the panels to the top-right panel.
substeps.markdown: Walk over all the panels to the top-right panel.

steps.plaintext: Wait for Fujiwara Toshiko to open the chest
steps.markdown: Wait for Fujiwara Toshiko to open the chest

steps.plaintext: Follow Fujiwara Toshiko to the camp
steps.markdown: Follow Fujiwara Toshiko to the camp
